ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:25:57 [Issue ID 4000-333658] urn:comicvine:4000-333658 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 13:02:03. [Issue ID 941163]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Sela journey to find the place known only as the tomb of Death leads her to a small town that may hold the secrets to its location. There she learns the truth of the temple that was once the training grounds for the knights of the realm and the tragic tale of their corruption and downfall at the hands of the Dark One's minion, the evil Winter Witch.
Notes:
The C2E2 Exclusive Variant Cover is a homage to the classic Marilyn Monroe pose in the movie Seven Year Itch.
